mean_cn: n. 合计；集合体；总计；  v. 集合；聚集；合计；  adj. 聚合的；集合的；合计的
mean_en: a total number or amount made up of smaller amounts that are collected together
word_etyma: ag使 + greg群 + ate动词后缀 → aggregate 聚集
sentence: The player earned an aggregated $48000000 from sponsorship deals.
sentence_trans: 这个运动员从赞助中获得的总收入有48000000美元。
